package.name: Toonimo
package.summary: Toonimo lets websites owners create custom-animations that guide site visitors through tricky parts of their websites (shopping carts, form fills, site navigation).
package.description:
Toonimo lets websites owners create custom-animations that guide site visitors through tricky parts of their websites (shopping carts, form fills, site navigation). Using Toonimo's platform, marketers create on-site, animations with behavior based triggers and easily measure the impact on their site conversion. So far, Toonimo's clients convert 21% more watch this video
Toonimo's platform lets online businesses create, behavior-based, personalized multimedia to boost onsite engagement & conversion.
* Is simple for marketers to create custom animations - adjust scripts, play triggers, characters, positioning, and other elements, * Uses behavior-based triggers for personal guidance – enabling different messages to be given to different users – appearing only when needed * Is easy to implement - a simple snippet of code on the site * Provides real time analysis about the impact of each animation through A/B testing
